title: Advertising, Public Relations and Media Design Department Fund
description: To provide support for the Advertising, Public Relations and Media Design Department at the College of Media, Communication and Information at the discretion of the Department Chair.
marketingContent: To support and benefit the activities and needs of the Advertising, Public Relations and Media Design Department (APRD) Department at CU Boulder, including but not limited to, technology updates, student programs and clubs, guest lectures and more.
